description:
Java XSL-FO processor.
      Converts Extensible Stylesheet Language Formatting Objects (XSL-FO) to PDF,
      PS, PCL, AFP, and many other formats. Requires a Java runtime such as jre8,
      corretto8jre, or adoptopenjdk8jre.
author: James Tauber,  Glenn Adams,  Chris Bowditch,  et al
